title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 180.11 - Sale of eggs from trout, lake trout, and atlantic salmon
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 180.11 - Sale of eggs from trout, lake trout, and atlantic salmon

State Regulations

Except as permitted under section
11-1909
of the Environmental

Conservation Law for private trout and bass hatcheries, no person shall buy, sell, offer or expose for sale, trade, barter, or cause to be bought or sold
eggs from any trout, lake trout or Atlantic salmon. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
180.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
